quantool package¶

Submodules¶

quantool.option module¶

Calculate option greeks:

1st order:

  • Delta

  • Vega

  • Theta

  • Rho

  • Epsilon

2nd order:

  • Gamma

class quantool.option.Option(option_type: str, s: float, k: float, r: float, tau: float, sigma: float = nan, d: float = 0, v: float = nan)¶

Bases: object

NOTE: All numeric values are with unit 1; No percent or any convention is used. NOTE: For now the code is structured for readability not for performance.

A performance-oriented c++ implementation maybe created later.

get_greeks()¶

Calculate the greeks

Get option price
